Text: Other than a few naming errors, and basically non-existent tags I only have one problem with this torrent: The Blooddrunk album is one big track instead of separate files.
There is .cue file ! Take Exact Audio Copy and split to tracks, two seconds and thats all.
I wish people would take the time to do tags correctly. Thanks for the up, but if you're gonna do it, how about doing it RIGHT?
